title: Feedback’s syllabus for teaching children maths at home
description: The existence of free will, plus how mayors in Italy implore people to stay home in Feedback’s weekly weird round-up
content: One of life’s enduring mysteries concerns the existence of free will. Do we have it? Don’t we have it? Feedback desperately hopes we don’t, as that makes our columns much easier to justify to the subeditors. (“We’d have loved to make it funnier, honestly, but… [+333 chars]
